storyboard.problem_description: Captive audience waiting to kill time in places like train, bus, airplane, train/bus stations, hospital receptions, etc.â€™
storyboard.target_customers: Ladies (graduates / post graduates) who are interested in pursuing part time job opportunities based on their skills/interests.The ladies might have prior industry experience but not in full time jobs currently.
storyboard.solution_summary: FunTube is a Wi-Fi hotspot based entertainment platform.FunTube offers smart phone delivered on-demand video, news,network games, and Specialized content.
storyboard.value_proposition: Consumers: On-demand Infotainment without paying for the internet bandwidth.Hotspot Partners: New Revenue Opportunity & Increased Customer Satisfaction.
